name: SoFriendly
description:
We're an entrepreneurial design team with a love for designing unique, ground-breaking products. We've taken on all sorts of different projects with various scale, speed, size, and involvemnet. Projects ranging from the very early stages, such as helping founders name their company, all the way up to helping massive enterprise clients build custom solutions! From time to time, we build out our own ideas and love seeing them come to life. 
 
Our Specialties: 
- Web-based Product Design and Development
- Mobile App and Product Development 
- Custom Software Development 
-Virtual Reality Development
- Software Maintenance Services ( Ongoing support services)
-If we're missing anything, just ask us! 
 
At the end of the day, we're a group of people who genuinely want to see great ideas be brought to life. If you have a question, want to talk ideas, or need help navigating the process just hit us up! We're only a phone call away and happy to help where we can.
